page.name: Last Breath
page.description: This amazing magical necklace holds a small bottle around the wearer's neck. It's said that you can breathe into the bottle and it will hold your last breath, allowing you to return from the dead (with 1 hp, at the start of the quest).

properties.name: Last Breath
properties.description: This amazing magical necklace holds a small bottle around the wearer's neck. It's said that you can breathe into the bottle and it will hold your last breath, allowing you to return from the dead (with 1 hp, at the start of the quest).

page.name: Everyone Knows It's Windy
page.description: Warlic has told you that he needs a sample of the special water, found only in the spring beyond this mountain pass, but the pass must be cleared first.

properties.name: Everyone Knows It's Windy
properties.description: Warlic has told you that he needs a sample of the special water, found only in the spring beyond this mountain pass, but the pass must be cleared first.
properties.complete: Wow! You really took the wind out of HuffPuff's sails! And Lungs! Well done, hero! Now that the mountain is clear, return to Warlic and get directions to the spring.
